page.title: 19MEDIA AT TEVIOTHEAD
page.content: {TELEVISION}PLAYS A MAJOR PART IN MOST PEOPLE'S LIVES ALTHOUGH SOME CHOOSE NOT TO HAVE A SET PREFERRING INSTEAD, TO RELY ON THEIR RADIO FOR INFORMATION AND NEWS.{RADIO TWEED,}A RECENT VENTURE, IS ENJOYED BY MANY FOR THEIR LOCAL BROADCASTS IN THE MORNING AND EVENING. BORDER TELEVISION GIVES COVERAGE OF LOCAL TOPICS OF INTEREST AS WELL AS NATIONAL PROGRAMMES. THE BBC PROVIDES BBC SCOTLAND AND BBC2. CHANNEL 4 IS RECEIVED AS WELL. DAILY PAPERS MONDAY-SATURDAY ARE DELIVERED BY THE POSTMAN FOR A SMALL CHARGE. THE CHURCH NEWSLETTER PROVIDES NEWS OF CHRISTENINGS, BURIALS AND GUILD MEETINGS.
